info.title: Google Tasks
info.description: The Google Google Tasks API provides developers with a powerful set of API endpoints for searching, reading, and updating Google Tasks content and metadata.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated users default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: completedMax
parameters.description: Upper bound for a tasks completion date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: completedMax=2031-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: completedMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for a tasks completion date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: completedMin=1970-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: dueMax
parameters.description: Upper bound for a tasks due date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: dueMax=2031-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: dueMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for a tasks due date (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Default: dueMin=1970-01-01. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of elements to return with this request. Default: maxResults=20. Maximum allowable value: maxResults=100.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Token specifying the result page to return. The default is to return the first page.

parameters.name: showCompleted
parameters.description: Specify whether or not to show completed tasks. Default: showCompleted=true

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Specify whether or not to show deleted tasks. Default: showDeleted=false

parameters.name: showHidden
parameters.description: Specify whether or not to show hidden tasks. Default: showHidden=true

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated users default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for a tasks last modification time (as an RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Use the RFC 3339 timestamp format. For example: 2010-08-09T10:57:00.000-08:00Z. The default is not to filter by last modification time.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying a subset of fields to include in the response. Use for better performance.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Specify the tasks parent task ID. No parameter indicates an insertion or a move to the top level of the task list.

parameters.name: previous
parameters.description: Specify the tasks previous task ID. No parameter indicates an insertion or a move to the first position in the sublist.

parameters.name: tasklist
parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated users default task list, use the special value @default.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: Task identifier.

parameters.description: Task list identifier. To refer to the authenticated users default task list, use the special value @default.
